Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted a thrilling tie in the first ODI of the series where spinners from both teams dominated.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian batting struggled on the tricky Colombo wicket, with Rohit Sharma performing but the likes of Virat Kohli, Shubhman Gill, and others getting starts but failing to convert them into big knocks.
Others: India and Sri Lanka played out a thrilling tie in the first ODI of the series where spinners from both teams dominated.
The Lankan batting was carried by Pathum Nissanka and an enterprising Dunith Wellalage, who performed well with the ball as well.
